Title: Meeseeks and Destroy
Writer: Justin Roiland (created by), Dan Harmon (created by), Ryan Ridley, Eric Acosta (staff writer), Tom Kauffman (staff writer), Wade Randolph (staff writer)
Actors: Justin Roiland, Chris Parnell, Spencer Grammer, Sarah Chalke
Plot: Rick provides the family with a solution to their problems, freeing him up to go on an adventure led by Morty.
